text: The Dilemma is a 2011 American comedy-drama movie. It was produced by Ron Howard, Vince Vaughn and Brian Grazer. It was directed by Howard. ==Plot== Ronny Valentine (Vince Vaughn) who catches his best friend's wife, Geneva (Winona Ryder) cheating on him with another man, Zip (Channing Tatum) and does not know whether he should tell him. == Cast == *Vince Vaughn as Ronny Valentine *Kevin James as Nick Backman *Jennifer Connelly as Beth Backman *Winona Ryder as Geneva Backman *Channing Tatum as Zip Hanson *Queen Latifah as Dana Coleman *Chelcie Ross as Thomas Fern *Amy Morton as Diane Tutin *Clint Howard as Plant Specialist == Other websites == * Official website * * Category:2011 buddy movies Category:2011 comedy-drama movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Ron Howard Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: The Dilemma
